          <title>
            <string language="sl">Magnetno polje zanke</string>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field of a loop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie von einer Schleife

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ magnétique d'une boucle</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Magnetno polje tokovne zanke.</string>
            <string language="en">The shape of a magnetic field caused by current carrying loop.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Form von einem magnetischem fangen

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La forme d'un champ magnétique provoqué par la

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A forma de um campo magnético causado pelo laço

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura di un campo magnetico causato dal ciclo

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μορφή ενός μαγνητικού πεδίου που προκαλείται από 
τον παρόντα φέρνοντας βρόχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La dimensión de una variable de un campo 
magnético causado por el bucle que lleva actual.</string>
